text: <@U026PHQ3J>: if we were to divide capture of each shelf into multiple cameras I assume our required pixel count/density drops accordingly?
like maybe (3) 2megapixel cameras would be ok?

attachments.text: STMicroelectronics STM32 F4 32-bit ARM Cortex™-M4 MCUs open the door to the digital signal controller (DSC) market with a family of devices that are pin-to-pin and software compatible with the STM32 F2.
